General.Name: Altek Corp
General.Description: Altek Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, production, and sale of automotive, medical, digital imaging, and other related application products. The company provides AI cameras and edge boxes, and IP cameras for home, banking and finance, hotel, retail, city, and industrial applications; AI chips for image quality enhancement, face detection, etc.; and 3D sensing modules and chips for robots, augmented reality/virtual reality devices, surveillance devices, and face payment systems. It offers automobile camera systems, including image assistance system/ mega pixel HD camera, IR camera, AVM, and ADAS; and medical imaging solutions, such as glucose meter, intelligent insulin delivery system, and disposable endoscope camera system. In addition, the company offers optical instruments, camera, and equipment; manufactures and sells digital still cameras and its accessories; research, development, manufacture, and sale of medical electronic equipment; wholesale, import, and export of digital cameras, digital video cameras, and related accessories; and research, design, and sales of imaging technologies, and electronic software and hardware. It operates in Asia, Europe, the United States, Oceania, and Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Asia Imagination Corporation and changed its name to Altek Corporation in February 1997. Altek Corporation was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.12, Li-Hsin Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
